EmailTemplate.name: International Dealer Account
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello!
We appreciate your interest in becoming an authorized International YETI Dealer. While we love hearing from prospective dealers, going global takes time and we do not always have the resources to provide you with an immediate response to your inquiry. We will pass along your information to our International Sales Team who will reach back out for additional information if you fit the criteria to be an international dealer.
Thanks,
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeti.com yeti.com
